channel.title: The legendary pianists II
channel.description:
Music by great early-twentieth century concert pianists who produced Duo-Art piano roll recordings before advent of electronic recording.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Stravinsky
item.description: This program presents Igor Stravinsky, concluding his Fire Bird Suite.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Brahms, Chopin and Bach
item.description: This program presents Edwin Fischer and Ferruccio Busoni playing works by Brahms, Chopin and Bach.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Beethoven and Schumann
item.description: This program presents Harold Bauer playing works by Beethoven and Schumann.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Bach, Beethoven, Chopin, Scriabin
item.description: This program presents Alfred Cortot playing works by Bach, Beethoven, Chopin, Scriabin and Saint-Saens.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Saint-Saens, Chopin
item.description: This program presents Camille Saint-Saens playing five of his own works plus a selection by Chopin.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Stravinsky
item.description: This program presents Igor Stravinsky playing his Etude pour Pianola, Sonata (1924) and the first movement of his Concerto (1924).
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Brahms
item.description: This program presents Mitja Nikisch and Edwin Fischer playing works by Brahms.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Stravinsky
item.description: This program presents Igor Stravinsky playing his Fire Bird Suite.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Bach and Liszt
item.description: This program presents Alexander Siloti playing works by Bach and Liszt.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Beethoven, Chopin and Liszt
item.description: This program presents Wilhelm Backhaus playing works by Beethoven, Chopin, Kreisler-Rachmaninoff and Liszt.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Handel, Chopin, Rubinstein, Schuman
item.description: This program presents Guiomar Novaes playing works by Handel, Chopin, Rubinstein, Schumann, Niemann and Philipp.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Rameau, Schumann, Beethoven
item.description: This program presents Harold Bauer playing works by Rameau, Schumann and Beethoven.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Beethoven, Handel and Chopin
item.description: This program presents Teresa Carreno playing works by Beethoven, Handel and Chopin.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Ravel
item.description: This program presents Maurice Ravel playing his Le Gibbet, La Vallee des Cloches, Oiseaux Tristes, Pavane, Pour Une Infante Defunte, and Toccata.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Liszt
item.description: This program presents Arthur Friedheim playing Liszt: On Lake Wallenstadt, Harmonies du Soir, Legende (The Bird Sermon), and Fountains at the Villa d'Este.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Grieg and Schumann
item.description: This program presents Percy Grainger playing Grieg's Norwegian Folk Songs and Schumann's Symphonic Etudes.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Chopin
item.description: This program presents Josef Hofmann playing works by Chopin.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Bach, Chopin and Liszt
item.description: This program presents Ignaz Friedman playing works by Bach, Chopin and Liszt.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Ignace Paderewski
item.description: This program presents Ignace Paderewski performing his own works.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Beethoven, Gluck, Moszkowsky, Scria
item.description: This program presents Josef Hofmann playing works by Beethoven, Gluck, Moszkowsky, Scriabin and Chopin.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Liszt
item.description: This program presents Rudolph Ganz playing works by Liszt.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Granados
item.description: This program presents Enrique Granados playing his Reverie Improvisation, Spanish Dances Nos. 1 and 7, Maid and the Nightingale, and The Dummy.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Albeniz, Rimsky-Korsakoff and Chopin
item.description: This program presents Artur Rubinstein playing works by Albeniz, Rimsky-Korsakoff and Chopin.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Bach, Paradies, Scarlatti, Brahms
item.description: This program presents Myra Hess playing works by Bach, Paradies, Scarlatti, Brahms, Debussy and Bergmein.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Liszt
item.description: This program presents Ernest Schelling playing Liszt's Sonata in B Minor.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Beethoven
item.description: This program presents Wanda Landowska playing Beethoven: Andante Favori and Sonata, Opus 26.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists
